body:
Hi, sarith. my film data is not match Klem's format. it's only matrix data like upload file(not real data). and I have exist angle data too. Can I exchange these data to Klem's format.
It may be slightly different. and i can't understand the number your upload picture. in your picture, "Transmission front [34.83863,0,0,0,,,,]" what is 34.83863? is this BSDF ? can I make these number in the calculation?
